content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "command_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 53, "index": 35}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 15, "index": 42}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 20, "index": 45}]

thought: I need to craft brown_concrete_powder and it requires placing 1 brown_dye and 4 gravel side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the gravel from slot 24 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1
